microsoft-learn.name: Microsoft Learn
microsoft-learn.description: Access to Microsoft Learn documentation, tutorials, and technical resources
when_to_use: Project involves Microsoft technologies (Azure, M365, Power Platform, .NET)
Need to understand Microsoft service capabilities
Looking for implementation patterns and best practices
Checking technical feasibility of Microsoft solutions
example_queries: How to authenticate with Azure Active Directory
Microsoft Graph API for accessing user data

agent_instructions.activation: When a user's request mentions Microsoft technologies or when researching solutions that might benefit from Microsoft services, activate this MCP server.
agent_instructions.usage: Use natural language queries to search for relevant documentation. Present findings as part of your research, not as raw search results.
agent_instructions.integration: Incorporate Microsoft Learn findings into your proposal under 'Technical Considerations' section with proper attribution.

how_to_use.for_agents: When your process includes researching Microsoft technologies, refer to this configuration to understand what's available via the Microsoft Learn MCP server. Use it to inform your proposals with accurate, official information.
how_to_use.for_humans: This configuration defines how agents can access Microsoft Learn. To actually use the MCP server, ensure you have Node.js installed and the MCP server package is available.
setup_instructions: Ensure Node.js is installed on your system
The MCP server will be automatically installed via npx when first used
No API keys are required for Microsoft Learn MCP
Agent will automatically reference this configuration when needed
